message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but $1800000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $1400000 is a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1600000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the market demand. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $1600000. I'd like to propose a price of $1450000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make a serious commitment to purchase the product. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $1550000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and the time I've invested in it. I hope you'll reconsider and take advantage of this final offer.
